results.Name: Foundation (Slab)

Maintenance Schedule.Minor: Yearly inspection for cracks, settling, or water damage.  Address any minor issues promptly.
Maintenance Schedule.Major: Every 5 years.  Thorough inspection by a foundation specialist.  May include soil testing, crack repair, and waterproofing if necessary.

results.reasoning: Given the last minor service was 2024-05-01, the next minor service is scheduled for 2026-05-01 (yearly). The last major service was at installation (2020-05-01),  a major service is recommended every 5 years, therefore the next major service is scheduled for 2025-05-01.
